nodes.text: Aponte was a male individual who lived during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, he was sent by Jabba the Hutt to promote and inform people about the Galactic Moon Festival created by the Hutt. Aponte worked along with Z'ozpheratu to create elaborate events in Moenia and Mos Eisley.
Aponte is mentioned in the Star Wars Galaxies website's article titled "Don't Fear the Reaper," that served as introduction for the Galactic Moon Festival in-game event.
